attributes.action: Change how child maintenance is calculated to consider expenses & affordability
attributes.additional_details: Change the way child maintenance is calculated. It should be a choice firstly based on personal circumstances - was the decision to have the child consensual? Was it forced upon? Was the father considered at all? They look at the figures and see x amount, staff threaten, use scare mongering tactics to FORCE men to pay. Even if their salary does not cover their own personal expenses, if child maintenance is higher than their mortgage, even if it is not affordable.
attributes.background: Child maintenance is DEMANDED, regardless of your personal circumstances, other expenses, mortgage and bills. You are forced to pay the amount even if it means going into your overdraft every month, not being able to pay personal bills, simply because NO other costs are considered.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing arrangements for child maintenance, but it's not clear if you want the Government to change how child maintenance is calculated, abolish legal requirements for non-resident parents to pay child maintenance, do both of these, or do something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
